author: IGN
description:
Check out the Announcement Trailer for Ire: A Prologue, a first-person psychological horror game developed by ProbablyMonsters. Players will find themselves on a stranded ship in the Bermuda Triangle. Unravel a complex mystery while avoiding a sinister creature that stalks the player from run to run. Ire: A Prologue is releasing on October 28 for PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Ire: A Prologue - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Teacake (Keery) and Naomi (Campbell), two young employees of a self-storage company built on the site of an old US military base, have their wildest night shift ever when a parasitic fungus escapes from the lowest sublevel of the base, where it was sealed by the government decades before. As the temperature rises underground, this highly contagious and rapidly mutating microorganism multiplies and unleashes its brain-controlling, body-bursting terrors on the facility’s inhabitants – human and otherwise. With time running out, it’s down to Teacake and Naomi, with the help of a grizzled retired bioterror operative (Neeson), to contain the merciless menace and prevent the explosive extinction of Mankind itself.

#ign #ColdStorageMovie
title: Cold Storage - Official Teaser Trailer (2026) Liam Neeson, Joe Keery, Georgina Campbell

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
The Battlefield 6 open beta isn't even live yet, and there's already 30,000+ players waiting in the queue. The beta goes live for this weekend and next, but early access to those with codes begins tomorrow. And early access or not, expect some long wait times if you're trying to get in. In Nintendo news, the creator of Pokémon and the former CEO of The Pokémon Company confirmed that Nintendo of America had some notes on Pikachu's original design. Before the game made its way to the U.S., Nintendo of America reportedly wanted to add "large breasts" to everyone's favorite electric mouse, and also wanted to toughen up some of the other pokémon, to make them less cute. Thankfully, those notes were ignored. And finally, Genshin Impact is being delisted on PS4 next month, and will be shutdown for that console next year. Don't worry, PS5 players will not be affected.

#IGN #Gaming #Battlefield6
title: Battlefield 6 Open Beta Queue is Tens of Thousands of Players Deep - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Theatrical Release Trailer for Hamilton, the hit historical biographical musical distributed by Walt Disney Studios. Hamilton will be released in theaters in the U.S., Canada, and Puerto Rico on September 5, the U.K. and Ireland on September 26, and Australia and New Zealand on November 13.
 
Hamilton is the story of America then, told by America now. Featuring a score that blends hip-hop, jazz, R&B, and Broadway, Hamilton has taken the story of American founding father Alexander Hamilton and created a revolutionary moment in theatre—a musical that has had a profound impact on culture, politics, and education. Filmed at The Richard Rodgers Theatre on Broadway in June of 2016, the film transports its audience into the world of the Broadway show in a uniquely intimate way.

Hamilton stars Lin-Manuel Miranda, Phillipa Soo, Leslie Odom Jr., Renee Elise Goldsberry, Daveed Diggs, Jonathan Groff, and more. Hamilton is directed by Thomas Kail and written by Lin-Manuel Miranda a
title: Hamilton - Official Theatrical Release Trailer (2025) Lin-Manuel Miranda

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Amon Gameplay Overview Trailer for Borderlands 4, the latest addition to the hit first-person looter shooter franchise developed by Gearbox. Players can get the rundown on Amon, fulfilling the Brute class, being extremely resilient and highly customizable frontliner who can use weaponized drones to adapt to any situation. Make use of his Forgehammer and Forgeaxes for attack-focused circumstances alongside the Forgeshield for soaking up damage to keep in the fight. Play as Amon in Borderlands 4 on September 12 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #Gaming #Borderlands4
title: Borderlands 4 - Official Amon Gameplay Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Behind The Scenes Featurette for Wicked: For Good, the sequel to the theatrical version of the hit Broadway play, distributed by Universal Pictures. Don't miss the latest featurette covering the different dynamics of Elphaba and Glinda as they settle into their historically iconic roles alongside the new film, acting as the bridge between the story of Wicked and The Wizard of Oz. Wicked: For Good is in theaters on November 21.

Directed once again by award-winning director Jon M. Chu and starring the spectacular returning cast, led by Academy Award® nominated superstars Cynthia Erivo and Ariana Grande, the final chapter of the untold story of the witches of Oz begins with Elphaba and Glinda estranged and living with the consequences of their choices. 

Elphaba (Cynthia Erivo), now demonized as The Wicked Witch of the West, lives in exile, hidden within the Ozian forest while continuing her fight for the freedom of Oz’s silenced Animals and desperately trying to expose the tr
title: Wicked: For Good - Official Behind The Scenes Clip (2025) Cynthia Erivo, Ariana Grande

author: IGN
description:
"One-Punch Man” returns with Season 3! Check out the latest trailer for the continuation of this series!

Saitama is a hero who only became a hero for fun. After three years of “special training,” he’s become so strong that he’s practically invincible. In fact, he’s too strong—even his mightiest opponents are taken out with a single punch. Alongside Genos, his faithful disciple, Saitama performs his official hero duties as a member of the Hero Association. One day, monsters claiming to be from the Monster Association suddenly appeared, taking a child of Hero Association executive hostage. The S-class heroes gather and plan a raid on the Monster Association hideout to rescue the hostage. Meanwhile, Garou, a “human monster” who was taken by the Monster Association during a battle with the heroes, awakens in the Monster Association hideout."

Official Website：https://onepunchman-anime.net/
Official X Account： https://x.com/opm_anime

©ONE, Yusuke Murata/SHUEISHA, Heroes Association HQ
title: One Punch Man Season 3 - Official Trailer (English Subtitles)

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Announcement Trailer for Ashes of the Singularity 2, a large-scale real-time strategy game developed by Oxide Games. Players will command the United Earth Forces to reclaim Earth's territories, including Australia and Africa, alongside critical outposts on planets and moons across the solar system. Engage with an arsenal of advanced units with key gameplay mechanics to overcome enemy opponents. Ashes of the Singularity 2 is coming soon to PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Ashes of the Singularity 2 - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
At Evo 2025, we caught up with Tekken Series Director Katsuhiro Harada, Game Director Kohei Ikeda (Nakatsu), and Producer Michael Murray to discuss the latest character, Miary Zo, along with touching upon the current state of Tekken after a tumultuous season 2 launch. 
Timecodes:

00:00 Intro
00:06 How did the trip to Madagascar inform Miary Zo's design?
02:33 Miary Zo's fighting style
04:06 Favorite type of character design (Brand new character, returning character, or guest character)
07:18 A return to Tekken Tag Tournament?
09:25 Season 2 Talk

#IGN #Gaming
title: Tekken 8 Devs Talk Miary Zo, Tag Tournament, and Season 2 - Video Interview | Evo 2025

author: IGN
description:
Check out the trailer for Eden, an upcoming movie starring Jude Law, Ana de Armas, Vanessa Kirby, Daniel Brühl, and Sydney Sweeney.

From Academy Award–winning director Ron Howard, Eden unravels the shocking true story of a group of disillusioned outsiders (Jude Law, Ana de Armas, Vanessa Kirby, Daniel Brühl, and Sydney Sweeney) who abandon modern society in search of a new beginning. Settling on a remote, uninhabited island, their utopian dream quickly unravels as they discover that the greatest threat isn’t the brutal climate or deadly wildlife, but each other. What follows is a chilling descent into chaos where tensions spiral, desperation takes hold, and a twisted power struggle leads to betrayal, violence, and the deaths of half the colony.

Eden is produced by Brian Grazer, Ron Howard, Karen Lunder, Stuart Ford, William M. Connor, and Patrick Newall. It is written by Noah Pink.

Eden, directed by Ron Howard, opens in theaters on August 22, 2025.

#IGN #EdenMovie
title: Eden - Official Trailer

author: IGN
description:
What would you sacrifice to become the greatest of all time? Check out the trailer for HIM, an upcoming movie starring Tyriq Withers, Marlon Wayans, Julia Fox, Tim Heidecker, Jim Jefferies, Maurice Greene, Guapdad 4000, and Tierra Whack. HIM opens in theaters on September 19, 2025.

From Oscar winner Jordan Peele and Monkeypaw Productions, producers of the landmark horror films Get Out, Us, Candyman and Nope, comes a chilling journey into the inner sanctum of fame, idolatry and the pursuit of excellence at any cost, featuring an electrifying dramatic performance from Marlon Wayans (Air, Respect).

Former college wide-receiver Tyriq Withers (Atlanta, the upcoming I Know What You Did Last Summer) plays Cameron Cade, a rising-star quarterback who has devoted his life, and identity, to football. On the eve of professional football’s annual scouting Combine, Cam is attacked by an unhinged fan and suffers a potentially career-ending brain trauma.

Just when all seems lost, Cam receives a li
title: HIM - Official Trailer (2025) Marlon Wayans, Tyriq Withers

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Official Trailer for The Cut, an action drama thriller film distributed by Republic Pictures. Follow the journey of a former champ crawling his way back to victory by needing to cut an incredible amount of weight in six days by any and all means necessary. The Cut is in theaters on September 5.

After a career-ending defeat, a former champion trains for redemption – but as obsession takes hold and reality unravels, he may be spiraling into something far more.

The Cut stars Orlando Bloom, Caitríona Balfe, John Turturro, and more. The film is directed by Sean Ellis, with The Cut being written by Justin Bull.

The Cut is in theaters on September 5.

#IGN #TheCut #NewMovies
title: The Cut - Official Trailer (2025) Orlando Bloom, Caitriona Balfe, John Turturro

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Season 5 BlackCell Battle Pass Trailer for Call of Duty: Black Ops 6, the latest installment in the first-person action shooter franchise developed by Treyarch. 

Players can soon gain access to the Season 5 BlackCell Battle Pass, packed with content over 7,000 Call of Duty Points in value, including the Solace Operator, “Griffin Nabbed” Finishing Move, “Herald” Mastercraft Blueprint, and more. Stand out in the lobby with the Season 5 BlackCell Battle Pass, launching on August 7 for Call of Duty: Black Ops 6.

#IGN #BlackOps6 #Blackcell
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 - Official Season 5 BlackCell Battle Pass Trailer

author: IGN
description: Static Dread is available now on PC via Steam. Check out the unsettling Static Dread launch cinematic trailer for the psychological horror game. Lovecraft meets Papers, Please. Play as a lighthouse keeper and guide ships safely into the harbor using your radio. Survive the presence of something impossible, and don’t let the shadows consume you.
title: Static Dread: The Lighthouse - Official Launch Cinematic Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In this special episode of Devs React to Speedruns, the team at id Software sits down to watch an absolutely wild 42-minute speedrun of DOOM: The Dark Ages by the incredibly skilled SeekerTV. Game Director Hugo Martin, Director of Game Technology Evan Eubanks, and Level Design Director Brandon Souders provide real-time commentary as they witness their carefully crafted game get utterly dismantled through a barrage of fancy tricks, frame-perfect skips, and hilarious glitches. From broken boss fights to out-of-bounds mayhem, this run is packed with jaw-dropping moments that leave even the developers speechless.

If you're a fan of DOOM speedruns, glitch showcases, or just love hearing developers react to players breaking their game in the most creative ways possible, this video is a must-watch. Featuring the fastest known completion of DOOM: The Dark Ages, expert developer insight, and top-tier gameplay from SeekerTV, this is one speedrun reaction you don’t want to miss. Whether you're
title: Doom: The Dark Ages Developers React to 42-Minute Speedrun

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Season 3 Trailer for PGA Tour 2K25, the hit golf simulation game developed by HB Studios. 

Players can gain access to a brand-new season of PGA Tour 2K25, bringing access to new cosmetic rewards by climbing the leaderboards. Earn jackets, golf balls, clubs, and more with new and unique designs. Season 3 for PGA Tour 2K25 is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #PGATour2K25 #PGATour
title: PGA Tour 2K25 - Official Season 3 Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the 'Shock 'N Awesome' Chapter 6 Season 4 Launch Trailer for Fortnite, the hit third-person battle royale game developed by Epic Games. 

Players can soon access brand new content for the game as per the new 'Shock 'N Awesome' Chapter 6 Season 4, packed with new skins from the likes of Halo and the Power Rangers, armed with miniguns, high-capacity rocket launchers, and more. The upcoming 'Shock 'N Awesome' Chapter 6 Season 4 for Fortnite is launching on August 7.

#IGN #Fortnite #EpicGames
title: Fortnite - Official 'Shock 'N Awesome' Chapter 6 Season 4 Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In this snippet from Podcast Beyond Ep 908, Ninja Gaiden: Ragebound continues the tradition of Tecmo Koei’s brutal and beloved 8-bit platformer, and we had a chance to ask game director and producer David Jaumandreu all about how it came to life, the games killer soundtrack, its inspirations from the original NES game and much more on this week’s episode of Beyond. 

This weeks show is Max Scoville, Jada Griffin, Nick Maillet, and is produced by Tayo Oyekan

#IGN #playstation #NinjaGaiden
title: Ninja Gaiden: Ragebound Revives The Best of the NES Classic - Beyond Clips

author: IGN
description:
Ink mist churning, mysterious happenings unfold. Step into the Danqing Realm in this latest Infinity Nikki trailer to see what to expect with Version 1.8: Danqing Season, including new events and the Ink-Woven Tales quest. Infinity Nikki's Version 1.8: Danqing Season is available now.

#IGN #InfinityNikki #InkWovenTales
title: Infinity Nikki - Official Danqing Season Trailer

author: IGN
description: Introducing Peregrino, an isometric-view survival game "set in a cursed land steeped in gothic horror and religious folklore" where you must guide your group of pilgrims towards the paradise of New Eden – but you'll have to survive the dark purgatory of the "land in-between" in order to get there. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3268150/peregrino
title: Peregrino - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In our first hands-on with PowerWash Simulator 2, we found the relaxing cleaning game to have upgraded pretty much everything – except the water. Still, we had a nice, chill time with it, including its new features. Previewed on PC by Katie Lloyd Williams

#IGN #Gaming
title: PowerWash Simulator 2 Has You Dig a Dirty Toilet Out of a Town Square

author: IGN
description:
At Evo 2025, we had the chance to sit down with Riichiro Yamada, the producer of the new Virtua Fighter Project, and ask him about his vision for the series, how gameplay might change from the older games, and who the heck Stella might be!
Thanks to World of Longplays and the player (georgc3) for use of their footage!
https://www.youtube.com/@worldoflongplays
https://longplays.org/home.php
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o7HQ2vspMHA

Timecodes
00:00 - How close to the concept footage do you expect the final game to look?
00:53 - How are you planning on modernizing the new Virtua Fighter?
02:26 - Based on how you've described the new VF in the past, what does "innovation" and "reality" mean to you?
04:13 - Are these the same characters from the old games or is it more of a reboot?
06:06 - Who is Stella, and what's her connection with Sarah Bryant?
06:30 - Is it important for VF to be only three buttons or does it need to evolve?
08:16 - Is Akira still the face of the franchise?

#IGN #
title: Virtua Fighter Interview - Pushing Reality and Innovation | EVO 2025
